text: tavada adhyapana (dænuma) næti aya “allah apa samaga (kelin) kata kala yutu noveda? nætahot (liyana lada) vadanak (kelinma) apata pæminiya yutu noveda?”yi vimasannaha. movun illana akarayatama movunta pera sitiyavunda (musa nabi vetin) vimasuha. (ovunge hrdayan) movunge hrdayanta sama vanneya. (satyaya) sthira karana janatavata apage sadhakayan niyata vasayenma api pæhædili kara ættemu
